snippet: Mark Teixeira, who reinjured his left calf in making the final out in Saturday's loss to the Orioles, will miss series against the Red Sox and the Rays.
abstract: Mark Teixeira, who reinjured his left calf in making the final out in Saturday's loss to the Orioles, will miss series against the Red Sox and the Rays.

headline.main: Teixeira Out 10 to 14 Days With Calf Strain
headline.print_headline: Teixeira, Sidelined Again, Will Miss Up to Two Weeks
